resources.string: Auto cancel notifications for HarmonyOS Lite
Invalid username or password. Please try again!
Currently, we support Dexcom Accounts from USA only!

ATTENTION: Please carefully read this before continue.

This application is NOT an official Dexcom Application and is NOT related in any way with Dexcom.

The application is for informational purposes only and is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
The app's creators and publishers are not responsible for any adverse effects or consequences that may result from the use of this app.

The app is provided "as is" and without any warranties, express or implied.
The app's creators and publishers disclaim all liability for any direct or indirect damages caused by the use of this app.

Please use at your own risk.

Please read our Terms and conditions very carefully.

By using this app, you agree to these terms and conditions.

ATTENTION: For the app to work correctly you need to make sure the following settings are enabled for your application:

1. Notifications are allowed
2. The app is NOT paused if unused
3. The permissions are NOT removed if app unused
4. Application has unrestricted data usage
5. Application has unrestricted battery usage

Please reffer to your device configuration for each settings.

Recommended settings for this application:

1. Notifications are allowed

2. Uncheck "Pause app activity if unused" checkbox under application permissions

3. Uncheck "Remove perissions if app unused" checkbox

4. Battery settings for the application is set to "Unrestricted"

5. Mobile data is allowed for background data and while "Data saver" is on
